name: Trizzy Bee
description:
Controls: WASD or ARROW KEYS and HOLD SPACE

Blue orbs water the tree. It will heal the tree if it is decaying, and then it will grow.

Green orbs heal sections of the tree, but it will not grow the tree.

Yellow orbs kill infections. Infections are black/red blinking orbs that make the tree decay very fast.

Hold space bar to fly up to the higher parts of the tree to heal and kill infections.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/trizzy-bee
